attributes.action: Sack Richard LittleJohn from The daily Mail online,  he is a racist BNP & EDL member!
attributes.additional_details:
We are calling for Richard LittleJohn, journalist for the daily mail to be sacked.
His journalism is a total disgrace and should not be tolerated.
The UK is a Equal Opportunists, Multi Race, Free country and for a journalist in this country to come out with such hate towards other religions and faiths is unacceptable.

He recently wrote an article about  an upcoming event planned to be held in LegoLand Windsor in march 2014, he titled it  'Jolly Jihadi Boy's Outing to Legoland'
This article is so out of line, I can't actually believe it was published. There are many things in the article that are incorrect regarding Islam, and he must be held accountable for his actions as this has offended many Muslims and Non-Muslims in the UK community.
